name: TORNADO
description: A quick slash, summoning a gust of wind that cuts through the air, dealing {minDamage}-{maxDamage} guaranteed damage.

start: {attack_name} begins with a swift swing of {weapon_name}, gathering wind around the blade.
A gentle breeze forms around your weapon as {attack_name} begins.
The air stirs as {attack_name} swings with the force of a breeze.
The blade hums as you swing it, the winds ready to obey your command for {attack_name}.
hit: {attack_name} strikes {enemy_name} for {damage} damage, the wind cutting through their defenses.
The air swirls around {enemy_name} as {attack_name} lands a clean blow dealing {damage} damage.
The gust from {attack_name} catches {enemy_name}, dealing {damage} damage and sending them reeling.
The wind cuts through {enemy_name}'s guard, leaving a mark with {attack_name} for {damage} damage.
crit: A sharp gust erupts from {weapon_name}, delivering a crushing {damage} damage blow to {enemy_name}!
With the force of a gale, {attack_name} hits {enemy_name} for {damage} damage with incredible power!
The wind turns fierce as {attack_name} delivers a devastating {damage} damage strike to {enemy_name}!
The wind howls as {attack_name} delivers a {damage} damage blow so strong it knocks {enemy_name} back!
